text: “Nba, xa naxan tuli na, Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin naxan falama dɛnkɛlɛya yamane xa, a xa na mɛ. Naxan na nɔɔn sɔtɔ, n Manna donse2.17 Manna donseen findixi donseen nan na Ala yi naxan fima a yamaan ma tonbonni lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ Nabi Musaa waxatini. Na fe mato Xɔrɔyaan 16.13-15 nun 16.31 kui. luxunxina nde soma nɛn a yii e nun gɛmɛ fixɛna xili nɛnɛn sɛbɛxi naxan ma, muxu yo mi naxan kolon, fɔ naxan a sɔtɔma.”
